reviewText: I love this show its great definitely worth it!!! its a great quality and it came in one case with several cds and several shows on one disc

Just so we're clear on one thing. This is the complete number of episodes HBO ever saw fit to release on DVD. It is NOT the complete episodes as originally ran on HBO. It represents a "sample culling" of same.
Didn't find my favorites episodes on here. I did find you can watch on utube for free
Good

I like the series, so this review is not about the Hitchhiker... it is about this product, the supposed complete collection. There are literally a hundred episodes and by the implication of this title all of them should have been on this dvd. Instead i got only a handful of episodes from only one season. It wasn't even a complete season of the Hitchhiker. I was pissed. So now I vent.
Great

Havent seen this series since my mother watched every week when i was a little girl. She suggested i order this when i got the TFTC series. Hope the pic quality is good because its gotten mixed reviews. Packaging was perfect.

This set collects volumes 1-3 that were previously released separately into a single set which is great if you can't track them down. Just don't purchase if you're looking for a complete series collection.
Cool man, costent thrill!
Very good series!
Good Collection
Very good
Very very very satisfied "I LOVE SHOPPING WITH AMAZON"
Gifted. But am told the collection was exactly as described and the recipient is very happy.
This is NOT the Complete collection.  There are only 30 episodes here out of a total of 85 episodes. A deliberate lie - who do i see about that ????
Enjoyed it; reminded me of a time gone by
I bought this because I remember seeing it as a small child.  The themes are a bit repetitive and some of the acting is questionable.  It's a nice collection of relatively tame horror stories.
Thank you nothing like old time shows =)
Bought this as a gift for someone who loves Creepshow, Tales from the Darkside, and other creepy stories. I think that he will like it.
Good stuff. If you enjoy suspense, mystery with just the right amount of twilight zone and sci-fi then youll love this.
The condition is great! Brand new DVD's. This show is a classic!

LOVE IT--I have been looking for the Hitchhiker collection for a long time.  I realize I need some of the other ones also.
FAN
Many stars in many deep situations. Mostly well done,but too damned violent.
Great series in the tradition of the twilight zone.

i gave this 2 star because i bought this hoping my favorite 2 episodes will be here and they are not. how can they leave these 2 out. shatted vows and when morning comes. those are my favorites and they are not here. they were the best episodes of the entire series. all the other episodes don't interest me.
Very happy with dvd
great terror flicks
Great collection at great prize
It's not complete. No way is it complete!
GLAD TO OWN IT LOVE IT
Great item

This collection  is  not  complete.  My  main reason for buying  it  was  for  the  Karen Black episode, which does not appear
anywhere  in  this  set.  It  did appear  on  the  VHS, so stop  calling  it  the  complete  collection.

The show itself is fine  nice 80s nostalgia  and the presentation is okay here as well.

Less okay: calling this The Complete Collection when it includes fewer than half of the episodes. Thats not deceptive marketing  its a bald-faced lie. Not cool.

-cheesy as hell but still some episodes are watchable, ha
-kinda like soft porn, a la Skinemax of yesteryear

Great series!
To all that have shown concern about the quantity of episodes v. the entire series, the truth lies in the detail...this is the complete collection of HBO ran episodes...the series shifted to the USA Network after about 35 episodes. This is the complete "HBO" collection..hope this helps!
Not only is this not "The Complete Series"---the episodes have all been CENSORED ! PGetc...
great show
I rememberd a lot of the hitchhiker from the day. To see these actors and actresses when they were young was a treat. I have always liked the music score and the way the episodes are narrated.

The episodes that were in this series were great. Loved them all. However, this is far from being a complete series as advertised. Lots and lots of episodes missing. At least 3/4, if not more, of the entire 6 season series is missing.. They should of called it "best of the hitchhiker" instead of the "complete collection". No where near a complete collection. Perhaps it was my fault for mistaking the word "collection" for "series". It is kind of misleading though. I'll have to pay attention more in how I read descriptions of products.
Not the complete collection.  Missing many episodes.
The show was not as I remembered. I will resell it. I think as time passes, things are not quite as they seemed.
I paid extra for the complete collection and got volume one instead. This is ridiculous.
